allow: Bash(mysql -u root cretas_db -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM time_clock_record;")
Bash(mysql -u root cretas_db -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM time_clock_records;")

Bash(mysql -u root cretas_db -e "INSERT INTO time_clock_record (user_id, username, factory_id, clock_date, clock_in_time, clock_out_time, break_start_time, break_end_time, status) SELECT user_id, username, factory_id, clock_date, clock_in_time, clock_out_time, break_start_time, break_end_time, status FROM time_clock_records WHERE factory_id=''CRETAS_2024_001'' LIMIT 15;")
Bash(mysql -u root cretas_db -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as new_count FROM time_clock_record WHERE factory_id=''CRETAS_2024_001'';")

Bash(mysql -u root cretas_db -e "SELECT id, user_id, factory_id, clock_in_time, status FROM time_clock_record WHERE factory_id=''CRETAS_2024_001'' AND user_id=1 AND clock_in_time >= ''2025-11-20 00:00:00'' AND clock_in_time < ''2025-11-21 00:00:00'';")
Bash(mysql -u root cretas_db -e "SELECT id, equipment_id, level, status, message FROM equipment_alerts WHERE factory_id=''CRETAS_2024_001'' AND status=''ACTIVE'' LIMIT 3;")

Bash(curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:10010/api/mobile/CRETAS_2024_001/equipment-alerts/1/ignore" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoiZmFjdG9yeV9zdXBlcl9hZG1pbiIsInVzZXJJZCI6IjEiLCJzdWIiOiIxIiwiaWF0IjoxNzYzNjczOTA5LCJleHAiOjE3NjM3NjAzMDl9.sCuUPcwGA4QFwPecdrOUw5ewQUADffoRSFmmhOmcZgc" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""ignoreReason"""": """"设备维护中，此告警可忽略""""}')

Bash(curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:10010/api/mobile/CRETAS_2024_001/equipment/alerts/2/acknowledge" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoiZmFjdG9yeV9zdXBlcl9hZG1pbiIsInVzZXJJZCI6IjEiLCJzdWIiOiIxIiwiaWF0IjoxNzYzNjczOTA5LCJleHAiOjE3NjM3NjAzMDl9.sCuUPcwGA4QFwPecdrOUw5ewQUADffoRSFmmhOmcZgc" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""notes"""": """"已确认，正在处理""""}')

Bash(curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:10010/api/mobile/CRETAS_2024_001/equipment/alerts/3/resolve" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoiZmFjdG9yeV9zdXBlcl9hZG1pbiIsInVzZXJJZCI6IjEiLCJzdWIiOiIxIiwiaWF0IjoxNzYzNjczOTA5LCJleHAiOjE3NjM3NjAzMDl9.sCuUPcwGA4QFwPecdrOUw5ewQUADffoRSFmmhOmcZgc" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""resolutionNotes"""": """"已更换设备部件，问题解决""""}')

Bash(curl -s -X POST "http://localhost:10010/api/mobile/CRETAS_2024_001/equipment-alerts/1/ignore" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJyb2xlIjoiZmFjdG9yeV9zdXBlcl9hZG1pbiIsInVzZXJJZCI6IjEiLCJzdWIiOiIxIiwiaWF0IjoxNzYzNjczOTA5LCJleHAiOjE3NjM3NjAzMDl9.sCuUPcwGA4QFwPecdrOUw5ewQUADffoRSFmmhOmcZgc" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""""ignoreReason"""": """"设备维护中""""}')
